title: Quick Take: Supreme Court Strikes Down Texas Abortion Law
description: The Supreme Court wrapped its term Monday with perhaps its most significant abortion ruling in decades. NPR legal affairs correspondent Nina Totenberg joins host/White House correspondent Tamara Keith and campaign reporter Scott Detrow to discuss the ruling — as well as a few others. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
